content: These strategic Cyber and Space Prime contracts, along with our first US intelligence community competitive prime win in the second quarter are great examples of how we're building our defense business for the future by establishing it as the world's leading platform agnostic training and simulation pure play, ensuring mission readiness by integrating solutions across all five domains. So that's not a de facto, a complete outsourcing, but it is definitely a different trend that you see where airlines have -- in order to be able to secure the training need that they have on a queued basis, you're they’re willing to and they're seeing the attractiveness of going into long term contracts with us.
